content: All the documents you upload will be converted into Office Open XML format (docx, xlsx or pptx) for faster editing.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining that uploaded documents will be converted into Office Open XML format for faster editing. It appears in a file conversion dialog.

usage.context:
<Text>
 {convertSingleFile
 ? isXML
 ? t("ConversionXmlMessage")
 : t("OpenFileMessage")
 : t("ConversionMessage")}
 </Text>
 
 {isXML ? (
 <div style={{ boxSizing: "border-box", padding: "16px 0 0" }}>
 <Text>{t("SelectFileType")}</Text>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'konvertasiya' is a direct transliteration of 'conversion' and might sound awkward. A more natural Azerbaijani word for 'converted' would be 'çevrilir'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün yüklənilmiş sənədlər sürətli redaktə etmək üçün Office Open XML formatına (docx, xlsx və ya pptx) çevrilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Office με ανοιχτή μορφή XML" is a literal translation of "Office Open XML" and isn't the most natural way to express it in Greek. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "μόρφη Office Open XML" or “μορφή XML του Office” for a more fluent translation. A more idiomatic option might be "σε μορφή συμβατή με το Office” though that changes the meaning slightly.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'for faster editing' is translated as 'pour garantir une édition rapide' which means 'to guarantee a fast editing'. While not completely wrong, it's a less direct and slightly awkward translation. A more accurate translation would convey the purpose of the conversion directly, not as a guarantee.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tous les documents transférés seront convertis au format Office Open XML (docx, xlsx ou pptx) pour faciliter une édition rapide.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text mentions 'faster editing,' while the Polish translation uses 'szybszy podgląd oraz edycję' which translates to 'faster preview and editing'. While not entirely wrong, it loses the direct emphasis on editing. 'Szybsza edycja' would be a closer translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wszystkie wgrane przez Ciebie dokumenty zostaną przekonwertowane do formatu Office Open XML (docx, xlsx lub pptx), aby umożliwić szybszą edycję.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔබ උඩුගත කරන සියළුම ලේඛන" (oba udhugath karana siyālumā lēkhanā) literally translates to "All documents you upload". While understandable, a more natural phrasing for Sinhala might be something like "ඔබ ඉහල් කරන සියළුම ලේඛන" (oba ihala karanā siyālumā lēkhanā) which is closer to 'the documents you upload'.

The word 'හරවනු ලැබේ' (haravanu_ṭē) means 'will be converted' but sounds a bit stiff and technical. A more natural and fluent way to express the same meaning in Sinhala would be 'අවර්තනය කරනු ලැබේ' (awarthanaya karanū labē) or 'සකස් කරනු ලැබේ' (sakasa karanū labē).

While not strictly incorrect, consider whether to use parentheses or dashes for the file extensions (docx, xlsx, pptx). While parentheses are common in English, dashes might read better in Sinhala. Both are acceptable, but consistency is key.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ ඉහල් කරන සියළුම ලේඛන වේගයෙන් සංස්කරණය සඳහා ඔෆිස් විවෘත XML ආකෘතියට (docx-xlsx-pptx) අවර්තනය කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'буде конвертовано' (will be converted) is in the future tense, which is correct, but it might sound slightly unnatural in this context. A present passive voice construction ('конвертуються' - are converted) might flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Усі документи, які ви передаєте, конвертуються в формат Office Open XML (docx, xlsx або pptx) для більш швидкого редагування.
